Self-Service Support.Name: Stack Exchange
Self-Service Support.Description: We actively submit and respond to conversations that occur on Stack Exchange and encourage you to visit Stack Exchange and search for topics related to using VA APIs and datasets.

Self-Service Support.Name: Quora
Self-Service Support.Description: We actively submit and respond to conversations that occur on Quora and encourage you to visit Quora and search for topics related to using VA APIs and datasets.

Direct Support.Name: Submit A Github Issue
Direct Support.Description: This entire developer portal is hosted on Github as a repository. Using your Github account you can submit an issue as part of the repository and we will respond as part of the regular support process.

Direct Support.Name: Twitter
Direct Support.Description: You are welcome to ping us on Twitter publicly, letting us now how we can help.

Direct Support.Description: You are welcome to ping us on LinkedIn publicly, letting us now how we can help.

Direct Support.Description: You are welcome to ping us on Google+ publicly, letting us now how we can help.
